# movielibutils

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

movielibutils help to retrieve [TMDB](https://www.themoviedb.org/) metadata for you hard-drive movie library.

## Installation

You can install the released version of movielibutils from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("movielibutils")
```
